Description: This task involves extracting the origin of the material described in the pathology report. The output should classify the tissue origin into one of the following categories: lung, lymph node, bronchus, liver, brain, bone, or other. The origin of the tissue is generally mentioned at the beginning of the report as aard materiaal.

single_label_multi_class_classification.description: The origin of the material. One of 'lung', 'lymph node', 'bronchus', 'liver', 'brain', 'bone', or 'other'.
